get.description: This API will return data about all our ATMs and is prepared to the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. It is regulated by the UK Competition and Markets Authority (CMA). Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

This API will return the branch details for all branches and is prepared to the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. It is regulated by the UK Competition and Markets Authority (CMA). Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

This API will return data about all BCA productsand is prepared to the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. It is regulated by the UK Competition and Markets Authority (CMA). Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

This API will return data about all commercial credit cards productsand is prepared to the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. It is regulated by the UK Competition and Markets Authority (CMA). Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

This API will return data about all PCA productsand is prepared to the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. It is regulated by the UK Competition and Markets Authority (CMA). Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

This API will return data about all SME lending productsand is prepared to the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. It is regulated by the UK Competition and Markets Authority (CMA). Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

This extended API will return data about all ATMs in the specified country. It is based-on the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. The extended functionality may not fully adhere to the non-functional requirements of the regulator. Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

This extended API will return data about all ATMs in the specified town. It is based-on the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. The extended functionality may not fully adhere to the non-functional requirements of the regulator. Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

This extended API will data about all ATMs within a specified radius (1 to 10 miles) of the specified latitude and longitude. It is based-on the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. The extended functionality may not fully adhere to the non-functional requirements of the regulator. Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Positive or negative decimal value in degrees. eg &quot51.50551621597067&quot

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Positive or negative decimal value in degrees. eg &quot-0.0180120225995&quot

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Number of miles (1 to 10) as an integer. Default = 1

get.description: This extended API will return data about all ATMs within a 5 mile radius of the specified postcode. It is based-on the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. The extended functionality may not fully adhere to the non-functional requirements of the regulator. Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

parameters.name: postcode
parameters.description: Letters and numerals only. No spaces or special characters. eg  &quotSW1A1AA&quot

get.description: This extended API will return the branch details for all branches in the specified country. It is based-on the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. The extended functionality may not fully adhere to the non-functional requirements of the regulator. Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

This extended API will return the branch details for all branches in the specified town. It is based-on the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. The extended functionality may not fully adhere to the non-functional requirements of the regulator. Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

This API will return the branch details for all branches within a specified radius (1 to 10 miles) of the specified latitude and longitude. It is based-on the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. The extended functionality may not fully adhere to the non-functional requirements of the regulator. Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Positive or negative decimal value in degrees. eg &quot51.50551621597067&quot

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Positive or negative decimal value in degrees. eg &quot-0.0180120225995&quot

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Number of miles (1 to 10) as an integer. Default = 1

get.description: This extended API will return the branch details for all branches within a 5 mile radius of the specified postcode. It is based-on the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. The extended functionality may not fully adhere to the non-functional requirements of the regulator. Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

parameters.name: postcode
parameters.description: Letters and numerals only. No spaces or special characters. eg  &quotSW1A1AA&quot

get.description: This extended API will return the branch details for a branch specified by its sort code. It is based-on the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. The extended functionality may not fully adhere to the non-functional requirements of the regulator. Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

parameters.name: sortcode
parameters.description: 6 digit number with no spaces or special characters. eg. &quot400003&quot

get.description: This extended API will return data about all BCA products for the specified segment. It is based-on the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. The extended functionality may not fully adhere to the non-functional requirements of the regulator. Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

This extended API will return data about all commercial credit cards products for the specified segment. It is based-on the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. The extended functionality may not fully adhere to the non-functional requirements of the regulator. Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

This extended API will return data about all PCA products for the specified segment. It is based-on the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. The extended functionality may not fully adhere to the non-functional requirements of the regulator. Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

This extended API will return data about all SME lending products for the specified segment. It is based-on the Open Banking standards as defined by the Open Banking Implementation Entity (OBIE) in data dictionary version 1.2.4. The extended functionality may not fully adhere to the non-functional requirements of the regulator. Data is only available for the United Kingdom.

ATMID.description: ATM terminal device identification for the acquirer and the issuer

BranchIdentification.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a retail branch of a financial institution

Currency.description: Defines currency type available for dispense

LocationCategory.description: Indicates the environment of the ATM

SiteID.description: Site identifying code, where ATM is located

SiteName.description: Site identifying name, where ATM is located

AccessChannels.description: Ways to interact with the bank when managing account

CardNotes.description: Optional additional notes to supplement the card details

CardWithdrawalLimit.description: The daily Limit that a customer can get via the ATM. This describes the default limit rather than the maximum

Contactless.description: Does the card issued have contactless facility

CreditScoringPartOfAccountOpeningForGett.description: Indicates whether a credit check performed on an inquiry to open an account is submitted

CreditScoringPartOfAccountOpeningForIDVe.description: Indicates whether a credit check is used to check the address of a potential new account holder

CreditScoringPartOfAccountOpeningIDVerif.description: Details on the specific credit scoring

CreditScoringPartOfAccountOpeningIsAHard.description: Describes the type of credit scoring

CreditScoringPartOfAccountOpeningText.description: Details on the specific credit scoring

Currency.description: Defines currency type available for dispense

InternationalPaymentsSupported.description: Indicates that the account supports international payments

MaximumMonthlyCharge.description: The maximum Relevant Charges that could accrue

MobileWallet.description: Mobile wallet supported by this product. A mobile wallet being any electronic device that allows an individual to make electronic commerce transactions

OverdraftOffered.description: Indicates whether an overdraft offered for this account

ProductDescription.description: Description of the product provided by the parent organisation

ProductIdentifier.description: Identifier within the parent organisation for the product. Must be unique in the organisation

ProductName.description: The name of the product used for marketing purposes from a customer perspective. i.e. what the customer would recognise

ProductType.description: Descriptive code for the product category

ProductURL.description: URL provided by the organisation which redirects to the product (on live products only). There might be more than one product at a given URL

TsandCs.description: URL provided by the parent organisation which redirects to the current T&Cs

ATMAtBranch.description: Indicated whether an ATM is at the branch

ArrivalTime.description: Time that the mobile branch is scheduled to arrive

BranchIdentification.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a retail branch of a financial institution

BranchName.description: Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party

BranchOtherFacilities.description: Any other facilities not mentioned in BranchFacilitiesName

BranchOtherMediatedServices.description: Mediated Services not described in BranchMediatedServiceName

BranchOtherSelfServices.description: Self Services not described in BranchSelfServeServiceName

BranchType.description: Information on the type of branch

CustomerSegment.description: Customer segment which the branch is able to service

DaysOfTheWeek.description: Description on when the mobile branch is available. e.g. The weekend of Glastonbury festival; or Mondays and during the shrimp season also Wednesdays

DepartureTime.description: Time that the mobile branch is scheduled to depart

FaxNumber.description: Collection of information that identifies a FAX number, as defined by telecom services.

ParkingLocation.description: Place where the mobile branch is located, such as between the news agent and the church.

StopName.description: Name of the stop of the mobile branch

TelephoneNumber.description: Collection of information that identifies a phone number, as defined by telecom services.

PaymentHoliday.description: Indicates whether a payment holiday is possible

PaymentHolidayDescription.description: Detailed description on the payment holiday if available

ProductIdentifier.description: Identifier within the parent organisation for the product. Must be unique in the organisation

ProductName.description: The name of the product used for marketing purposes from a customer perspective. i.e. what the customer would recognise

ProductType.description: Descriptive code for the product category

ProductURL.description: URL provided by the organisation which redirects to the product (on live products only). There might be more than one product at a given URL

TsandCs.description: URL provided by the parent organisation which redirects to the current T&Cs

CardNotes.description: Optional additional notes to supplement the card details
